Articles.Content:
I've finally come to building my first docked mun base. It is a 6 piece set of similarly designed landers in order to easily be attached using the 4 provided rovers. It also comes with an exploratory rover.

The ships can be found here and please feel free to adjust and modify them as I know that they can be more efficient and effective:

http://www./view/0m6enrzqlea1f3l/Mun_Crest_C0R3.craft

http://www./view/2qlr7xvp87bmmwa/Mun_T0W3R.craft

http://www./view/siedjywyl9brcs7/Mun_M1T0.craft

http://www./view/k82751ykdfvocx2/Mun_R3C0I_I.craft

http://www./view/iyfpvmay1ttw2d8/Mun_CR4N3.craft

http://www./view/duuoi68on86pupw/Mun_S7Ru7.craft
